story.in_game_description: The heart and story of the game
story.actual_requirements: Have a crafting table in your inventory.

story.in_game_description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe

story.actual_requirements: Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory.
Have an iron ingot in your inventory.

story.in_game_description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
story.actual_requirements: Have any type of iron armor in your inventory.
Have a lava bucket in your inventory.
Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory.

story.in_game_description: Deflect an arrow with a shield
story.actual_requirements: Deflect any projectile with a shield.

story.in_game_description: Form and mine a block of Obsidian
story.actual_requirements: Have a block of obsidian in your inventory.
Have a diamond in your inventory.

story.in_game_description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

story.actual_requirements: Have any type of diamond armor in your inventory.

story.in_game_description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table
Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager
story.actual_requirements: Throw a splash potion of weakness at a zombie villager and give it a golden apple (by facing the zombie and pressing the use key with a golden apple in your hand), then wait for the villager to be cured.

nether.in_game_description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball
nether.actual_requirements: Kill a ghast using a ghast fireball.

nether.in_game_description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld
nether.actual_requirements: Use the Nether to travel between 2 points in the Overworld with a minimum horizontal distance of 7000 blocks between each other, about 875 blocks in the Nether.

nether.in_game_description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress
Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it
nether.actual_requirements: Kill a Ghast while you are in the Overworld.
Have a wither skeleton skull in your inventory.

nether.in_game_description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod
nether.actual_requirements: Have a blaze rod in your inventory.
Be within a 100.9×100.9×103.5 cuboid centered on the Wither when it is spawned.
Pick up an item from a brewing stand potion slot. This does not need to be a potion. Water bottles or even empty bottles also trigger this advancement.
Be within a 20×20×14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it has become powered.

nether.in_game_description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time
nether.actual_requirements: Have all of these 13 potion effects applied to the player at the same time.

nether.in_game_description: Bring a beacon to full power
nether.actual_requirements: Be within a 20×20×14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it is being powered by a size 4 pyramid.

nether.in_game_description: Have every effect applied at the same time
nether.actual_requirements: Have all of these 26 effects applied to the player at the same time. This is a hidden advancement, meaning that it can be viewed by the player only after completing it.

end.actual_requirements: Have a dragon egg in your inventory.
Throw an ender pearl through or walk into an End gateway.
Summon an ender dragon using ender crystals.

end.in_game_description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle
end.actual_requirements: Have a bottle of dragon's breath in your inventory.

end.advancement: The City at the End of the Game
end.in_game_description: Go on in, what could happen?

end.parent: The City at the End of the Game
end.actual_requirements: Have a pair of elytra in your inventory.

end.in_game_description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
end.parent: The City at the End of the Game
end.actual_requirements: Move a vertical distance of 50 blocks with the levitation effect applied.

adventure.in_game_description: Adventure, exploration, and combat
adventure.actual_requirements: Kill any entity, or be killed by any entity.

adventure.in_game_description: Kill a raid captain.

adventure.Icon: Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...
adventure.in_game_description: Obtain an Ominous Banner, whether from a Pillager Outpost or from a Raid Captain.
Kill any hostile monster
adventure.actual_requirements: Kill one of these 25 mobs. ‌In Java Edition 1.16, elder guardians, ender dragons, endermites, hoglins, piglins, vexes, withers, and zoglins can also be killed for this advancement. Other mobs may be killed, but are ignored for the advancement.

adventure.in_game_description: Successfully trade with a Villager
adventure.actual_requirements: Take an item from a villager or wandering trader's trading output slot, and put it in your inventory.

adventure.in_game_description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall
adventure.actual_requirements: Collide on a horizontal side of a honey block when in air.

adventure.in_game_description: Shoot a crossbow
Change your respawn point[until JE 1.16]

adventure.Icon: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point‌[upcoming: JE 1.16]
adventure.in_game_description: Lie down in a bed. The advancement is granted as soon as the player is in the bed, even if the player does not successfully sleep.
Successfully defend a village from a raid
Throw a trident at something.

adventure.Icon: Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.
adventure.in_game_description: Hit something with a trident
Shoot something with an arrow
adventure.actual_requirements: Using a bow or a crossbow, shoot an entity with an arrow, tipped arrow or spectral arrow.

adventure.in_game_description: Kill one of every hostile monster
adventure.actual_requirements: Kill each of these 25 mobs. ‌In Java Edition 1.16, elder guardians, ender dragons, endermites, hoglins, piglins, vexes, withers and zoglins are also required for the advancement. Other mobs may be killed, but are ignored for the advancement.

adventure.in_game_description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death
Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village
Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow
Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
adventure.actual_requirements: Kill a pillager with a crossbow.

adventure.in_game_description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
adventure.actual_requirements: This is a hidden advancement, meaning that it can be viewed by the player only after completing it.

adventure.in_game_description: Discover every biome
adventure.actual_requirements: Visit all of these 42 biomes. Other biomes may also be visited, but are ignored for the advancement.

adventure.in_game_description: Strike a Villager with lightning
adventure.actual_requirements: Hit a villager with lightning created by a Trident with the Channeling enchantment.

adventure.in_game_description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away
adventure.actual_requirements: Kill a skeleton with a projectile while being at least 50 blocks away horizontally.

adventure.in_game_description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block with an arrow
adventure.actual_requirements: Shoot the center of a target with a projectile.

husbandry.in_game_description: The world is full of friends and food
husbandry.actual_requirements: Eat anything that can be eaten.

husbandry.in_game_description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

husbandry.actual_requirements: Use a fishing rod to catch a fish.

husbandry.in_game_description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch
Plant a seed and watch it grow
husbandry.actual_requirements: Plant one of these 5 seeds. Crops and plants without seeds are ignored for this advancement.

Breed pairs of each of these 15 mobs. ‌In Java Edition 1.16, hoglins are also required for this advancement. A trader llama does not count as a llama. Other breedable mobs, if any, are ignored for the advancement.

husbandry.in_game_description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!
husbandry.actual_requirements: Use a water bucket on a fish mob to get a bucket of fish.

husbandry.in_game_description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you
husbandry.actual_requirements: Eat each of these 39 foods. Other foods are ignored for this advancement.

husbandry.in_game_description: Completely use up a diamond hoe and then reevaluate your life choices
husbandry.actual_requirements: Exhaust the durability of a diamond hoe, breaking it.
